backend/main.mo: Motoko backend storing cafes in a map with add, list, search, and get-by-ID functions plus basic text‑based filtering.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a frontend search update to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color palettes and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and renders the app within the router provider.
frontend/src/components/cafes/CafeCard.t: Cafe card UI component with details, badges, click handling, and optional selection mode.
frontend/src/components/cafes/CafeTileMa: Canvas‑based OpenStreetMap tile renderer with wrap-around, panning, zooming, and cafe markers.
frontend/src/components/cafes/EmptyState: Shows guidance when no search params are provided and a no‑results message otherwise.
frontend/src/components/cafes/LoadingSta: Skeleton loading UI displaying placeholder cards during cafe fetches.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Page layout wrapper with header, main content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing attribution, copyright, and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Sticky header with logo and navigation back to the home page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook creating an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshing queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCafeDetails.ts: React Query hook that fetches cafe details by ID using the actor API with caching and disabled retries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCafeSearch.ts: React Query hook that searches cafes by keyword, city, or area, returning an empty array when no search params are provided.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color palettes.
frontend/src/lib/webMercator.ts: Utility functions for Web Mercator projections, converting between lat/lng, tiles, pixels, and clamped coordinates.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app with the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/CafeDetailsPage.tsx: Page that loads and displays cafe details, handling loading, not-found, and error states.
frontend/src/pages/CafeSearchPage.tsx: Cafe search interface with form inputs, list and map views, and selection handling via useCafeSearch.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and container settings using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current build state, including map-related deployment issues, search-behavior fixes, and a list of implemented features. Notes requirements for an alternative map solution and improved search filtering logic.
